title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set using row[0]
description: When a filter with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, the result set is either incorrect or null.
OB: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set after setting the filter 'row[0] equals to '.
EB: The expected result is that 'row[0]' cannot be used as a filter expression since it is generated after all the data has been fetched.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Actual result:
The first result record is returned when previewing the data set.

Expected result:
The filter should not be applied.
